top_comments.comment:
"I've got back and forth a hundred times, played it over in my head. There's no easy way to say goodbye when I'm still  tasting you on my lips.... Need a little time to think, You don't gotta wait for me. You can do your own thing, while I do some work on me." :( 

This sounds so real to the core!

I’m gonna get hate for my brutal opinion but here it is: There’s many talented singers coming out of Philippines lately, but Nadine isn’t one of them. If James wants to succeed, he needs to reflect, cut his losses & move on. Nadine shud stick 2 acting.

comments_since_last_sample.body: ngl, this song gave me chills down to my spine! extraordinarily good nadine , mind blown 🤯
Paulit ulit yung lyrics. Not so good.

As a Jadine fan, this cut deep. BUT! I am just so proud of you, Nadine. You never fail to amaze us with your creativity. You deserve so much more. Our unbothered Queen. Love you so much! Continue to inspire and create magic ❤️

For those obsessed with reading lyrics like I am 🤭. God bless.

I'm already on a red eye flight
Left a note outside your door
Couldn't bear to look into your eyes
See your heart sink right in to the floor

I've gone back and forth a hundred times
Played it over in my head
But there's no easy way to say goodbye
When I'm still tastin' you on my lips

Need a little time to think
You don't gotta wait for me
You can do your own thing
While I do some work on me
I don't wanna make a mess of your love
And I can't be the one that's holding you up
You can do your own thing
You don't gotta wait for me

You can't drink away a memory
And a touch won't wash away
What's meant to be will always be
Leave a crack in the door just in case

Before it all goes up in smoke

Good things can fall apart
I don't mean mean to break break your heart
